name: Home (itch) (Troy_Finnegan, J.faulkner)
description:
This is a game that expresses an experience of Home that not all people may be familiar with, the ideas in this game a drawn from personal experiences and was made to share the different view points people can have on a common topic.

Project Manager & Designer

Troy Finnegan

Programmer

Jay Faulkner

Texture work
